:• 2x '''1625''' Mbps - 3SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan., 1024QAM) :• '''750''' Mbps - 3SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan., 1024QAM) = '''''4000 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC4000 MU-MIMO Tri-Band Wi-Fi Router}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.tp-link.com/us/products/details/Archer-C4000.html}} {{SupportPage|vendor=TP-LINK|model=Archer-C4000}} *[https://www.tp-link.com/resources/simulator/webpages_c4000v2_us/index.html Interface Simulator] "17062924000-2.0 Rev1.0sp4" (or similar) is silkscreened :on the board in the FCC photos. • FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TE7C4000 TE7C4000] • [https://fccid.io/TE7C4000/Internal-Photos/TE7C4000-Internal-photo-1214-3681663 FCC images] *Web GUI: http://tplinkwifi.net Supported by the [https://www.amazon.com/TP-Link-Router/dp/B01MS4ODCJ TP-Link Router] skill for Amazon Alexa. ===See also=== * [[List of Tri-Band Wireless Devices]]
